channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [WFLY-4639] Error removing session
item.description:
When WildFly try to delete a session after expiration server write error removing session:

ERROR [io.undertow.servlet.request] (default task-78) UT015005: Error invoking method requestDestroyed on listener class org.jboss.weld.servlet.WeldInitialListener: java.lang.NullPointerException

standalone.xml:
<cache-container name="web" default-cache="passivation" module="org.wildfly.clustering.web.infinispan">
<local-cache name="passivation" batching="true">
<locking isolation="READ_COMMITTED" striping="false" acquire-timeout="60000" concurrency-level="3000"/>
<eviction strategy="LRU" max-entries="50000"/>
<file-store passivation="true" purge="false"/>
</local-cache>
<local-cache name="persistent" batching="true">
<file-store passivation="false" purge="false"/>
</local-cache>
</cache-container>
<cache-container name="ejb" default-cache="passivation" module="org.wildfly.clustering.ejb.infinispan" aliases="sfsb">
<local-cache name="passivation" batching="true">
<eviction strategy="NONE" max-entries="0"/>
<file-store passivation="true" purge="false"/>
</local-cache>
<local-cache name="persistent" batching="true">
<eviction strategy="NONE" max-entries="0"/>
<file-store passivation="false" purge="false"/>
</local-cache>
</cache-container>

EAR application have common session for all WARs application.
jboss-all.xml:
<jboss umlns="urn:jboss:1.0">
<shared-session-config xmlns="urn:jboss:shared-session-config:1.0">
<session-config>
<cookie-config>
<path>/</path>
</cookie-config>
<session-timeout>86400</session-timeout>
</session-config>
</shared-session-config>
</jboss>

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: does same problem also occur on WildFly 9 CR1?
This will be addressed for WF9 by the Infinispan 7.2.1 upgrade.
